thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value, Clean and comfortable
thread.title_full: Good value, Clean and comfortable - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: B0die
title: Good value, Clean and comfortable
text: Great location. Close to underground. Clean comfortable hotel. Great shower in bathroom. Staff very nice and friendly. Good breakfast buffet. Make sure to do the Hop on Hop off bus. Visited Harry Potter at Warner Bros Studio. Well worth a visit. Great experience overall and plenty of sightseeing done in 2 days.
